faction_profile.name: 모용세가 (Murong Family / 慕容世家)
faction_profile.type: Orthodox / Noble Clan (정파 무림맹 소속 명문세가)

location.geo_political_status: Located in the Northeast (Gwan-oe / Outside the Pass), slightly removed from the Central Plains.

heritage.origin: Descendants of the Xianbei tribe (선비족) and the Royal Family of the Yan Kingdom (연나라).
heritage.pride: Consider themselves royalty, superior to common martial artists.

faction_profile.political_stance: Orthodox Alliance Member (Generic) but Ambitious/Rebellious internally.
faction_profile.core_goal: Reconstruction of the Yan Empire (대연 제국 재건).
faction_profile.rivalry: Namgung Family (Competes for the title of the 'Best Sword Family').

personality: Obsessed with etiquette but ruthless in combat.
Operates in the shadows to build power for rebellion/restoration.

combat_style.summary: Extreme Speed (Fast Sword) and Technique over brute strength.
specialty: Dual Wielding (Sword & Saber or Dual Swords).
Reflection (Returning the opponent's force against them).
Combination of Sword (Geom) and Saber (Do) arts.

signature_technique.name: 두전성이 (Dou Zhuan Xing Yi / 斗轉星移)
signature_technique.effect: Reflecting the opponent's attack back at them.
signature_technique.origin: Famous technique from 'Demi-Gods and Semi-Devils' (Tian Long Ba Bu).

internal_energy.name: 건곤무양신공 (Heaven and Earth Unscathed Divine Art)
일월광명신공 (Sun and Moon Bright Divine Art)

list: 건곤파섬검 (Heaven Breaking Flash Sword) - Lightning speed.
염혈검 (Flame Blood Sword) - Rare fire attribute.
쌍용선풍검 (Twin Dragon Whirlwind Sword) - Dual sword technique.

fan_arts.description: Used by scholars or leaders to maintain dignity while fighting.

narrative_role: A rival who looks down on the protagonist for being a commoner.
A tragic faction trapped in the glory of the past.
Users of 'Reflection' arts, making them tricky opponents for brute-force protagonists.
